item.description:
Hi everyone-

Sorry to "call" it so late in the game. We are going to meet as originally planned this Friday 9/21 but at 6 pm instead of 7 pm. Our venue (Me and Ollie's on Water Street in Exeter) closes at 7 pm.

This meeting will be social and discussion-oriented.

Come and have a beverage and/or snack and meet others who are interested in sustainable living, peak oil and related issues!

We will discuss our interests and which topics we'd like to explore as a group this fall and winter.

We will also talk about the best ways to publicize Dr. Barry Rocks's presentation on 10/5. I have sent out several press releases but could use some help with the flyers and less traditional methods of publicizing.

I'm looking forward to our meeting!

Cathy Esmonde
item.name: The Seacoast Peak Oil/Sustainable Living September Meetup
